On way to Denver to relax for a couple of days.
Not every story has explosions and car chases. That's why they have nudity and espionage. - Bill Barnes and Gene Ambaum

Chistmas party!!!!
Finished my project assessment for the year. HR = bamboozlement.
Zeppelin - gallows pole
Vzw card keeping the gf entertained. Best sixty bones I spend
Driving through a snowstorm at night.
Setting off on our 4 hour trek from Detroit to Pittsburgh...Twitter to be one of my few sources of entertainment (no XM in the rental boooo)
GF's dad telling me how he is number 241 in the rankings of Professional Billiards players.
Interesting on the bailout. Pretty much a powerplay to keep unions out of the south.
Back to Pennsylvania today for my brother's graduation. Talk about a shitty time to graduate with a finance degree. Taking the gf with me

My life sized cutout of Mr. T is not going to make it in time for my SS party tomorrow. Fbomb!
Thanks Lotus Notes. When I go to my Inbox folder I get my calendar...hell, its even the wrong calendar.
3 day week, then just "on call" for the rest of the year. Booked NYE in Chicago -- Denver this T-R-S, MI Sat & Sun -- PA inbetween. Mannnnn

Guitar Hero World Tour++++++
My parents bought my Grandpa a golf cart -- so awesome.
Can't wait to give my family their gifts...going to be so awesome!
Low key Xmas eve. Dark Knight with the men in my family.
Stoked to be home...just showed my Grandpa all of my pics from Singapore, China, Thailand, India, and everywhere else in between this year.
And when Santa squeezes his fat white ass down that chimney tonight he's gonna find the jolliest bunch of assholes this side of the nuthouse
Catching up on music I missed in 2008 while I clean up the parent's pc. Snow Patrol while I scream "Rambus???????????????"

Gears continue to turn on how to make the most of 2009. Pretty excited.
